name: webdev_listScreens
description: List available screens/displays that can be captured

name: webdev_takeScreenshot
description: Take a screenshot of a specific screen and return it as a base64 encoded string.

screenId.description: ID of the screen to capture. Use listScreens to find available screens. Default is 1 (main screen)

timeout.description: Maximum time to wait in milliseconds (default: 0, no timeout)
